title: Looking For A Duo Partner.
body:
Hi, I've been looking for a regular duo partner for a very long time, I'm currently in Silver 5, I can play Support and adc. You can be Any Postion, Leave Your Ranks and IGN below.

Support: Zyra & Blitzcrank.
Adc: Tristana & Lucian.

replies.body:
Hey dude if the offer is still up i'm keen to come play just don't put me in top.
My IGN is Lil Kobes and being able to use discord is a huge bonus

Regards,
Lil Kobes

I'm Silver 5 too, play anything except ADC but prefer mid or support.
Add me. Amacek.
I've Sent you a friend Request.
I've Sent you a friend Request.
